sentences.english: The famous writer Liu Xinwu writes the introduction for his new book.
sentences.chinese: 知名作家刘心武为他的新书写序。

sentences.english: In addition, "the reallife fiction" of Liu Xinwu has also had the widespread influence.
sentences.chinese: 此外，刘心武的“纪实小说”也产生了广泛影响。

sentences.english: Liu Xinwu, Chinese celebrated writer in modern time.
sentences.chinese: 刘心武，中国当代著名作家。

definition: Cao Xueqin (c. 1715-c. 1764), accepted author of A Dream of Red Mansions 紅樓夢|红楼梦[Hong2 lou2 Meng4]
A Dream of Red Mansions (first completed edition 1791) by Cao Xueqin 曹雪芹[Cao2 Xue3 qin2], one of the four great novels
"Redology", academic field devoted to the study of A Dream of Red Mansions
